author: Madeline MacGregor
title: Gettings Creek Rest Area reopens
text:
Gettings Creek Rest Area reopens Gettings Creek Rest Area reopens 
Posted on: July 20th,   
Update, 5:21 p.m. July, 20th: Both sides of the rest area have now reopened following a several-hours long closure due to a major water leak. 
1: 30 p.m. Gettings Creek Rest Area on I-5 (near Springfield) is closed temporarily to both north and southbound traffic. Staff report a major water leak is causing severe problems. We will let you know as soon as repairs have been completed and post the update on this page as well as to our agency Facebook page. The next closest rest area is Oak Grove (near Eugene) or Cabin Creek, near Roseburg. Thank you for your patience. Share this post:
